title: LF Platinum 3+ players to start a team with for upcoming tournaments.

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Must be platinum 3+, any position is wanted, join this discord server and leave your: IGN, Rank, Role and Champ Pool.
Please type in the all chat channel and I will reply to you as soon as I can. If you would rather talk to me in game then add thereoker in game.
Another option is to comment down below with your details.
